member_organisations:
The National Hairdressers Federation represents over 5000 business owners for hairdressing salons, barber shops and beauty salons.  There are too many to list, but the link below allows members of the public to search for a salon by name or postcode.  We hold a database of members and their contact details. 
http://www.nhf.info/salon-search/
fields_of_interest: Trade, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry
head_office_address: One Abbey Court Fraser Road Priory Business Park
eu_initiatives: The National Hairdressers Federation is the UK member on Coiffure EU, a body representing hairdressing trade associations across Europe.  Coiffure EU and UNIEuropa are engaged in social dialogue concerning health and safety. Coiffure EU also works on other issues affecting the industry across Europe such as chair renting (self-employment), training and small business issues.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
Coiffure EU 
http://www.coiffure.eu/  
 
The Trade Association Forum 
http://www.taforum.org/
goals__remit: The National Hairdressers Federation helps members build successful, profitable and sustainable businesses.  We provide membership services including 24/7 access to free employment law advice, free employment contracts, Apprenticeship contracts and chair renting agreements, training courses, events, competitions and artistic activities, discounts and savings as well as campaigning on issues which affect our members and their businesses at national and European level.
relevant_communication:
http://www.nhf.info/news/ 
This link shows current issues the National Hairdressers Federation campaigns on, mainly within the UK.
